content: Created a GitHub Actions CI workflow at `.github/workflows/ci.yml` that checks out the repo, sets up Python, installs pytest/jsonschema (and the package if present), and runs `pytest` to fail on any schema or benchmark mismatches.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('.github/workflows/ci.yml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "**" ]
  pull_request:""",
"""jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      fail-fast: false
      matrix:
        python-version: ["3.11"]
    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: ${{ matrix.python-version }}
          cache: pip

      - name: Install dependencies
        shell: bash
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          # Install test tooling explicitly for reproducible CI
          python -m pip install pytest jsonschema
          # Install project if it is a package (optional)
          if [ -f pyproject.toml ] || [ -f setup.py ] || [ -f setup.cfg ]; then
            python -m pip install -e .
          fi

      - name: Run tests
        run: pytest -q"""
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

content.text: Created a GitHub Actions CI workflow at `.github/workflows/ci.yml` that checks out the repo, sets up Python, installs pytest/jsonschema (and the package if present), and runs `pytest` to fail on any schema or benchmark mismatches.
